1.content:
So, the scenario's to start are:

1) Planet of the Giantesses
In this scenario, you are either an astronaut who crash landed on a planet full of giantesses or you are part of a group of volunteers for a new teleportation device. Either way, you end up on a planet where a full grown adult of earth is only the size of a baby of the natives.

2) Baby toy
A mother wishes that she could find a playmate for her 2 year old daughter and comes across a shrink/growth ray. She uses this device on you and tells you that you are her daughter's 24 hour playmate and that she will treat you like you were the same age as her daughter is.

3) Girlfriend needs a new "big boy"
Your girlfriend has a way(remote, shrink ray, inherent powers, etc.) to manipulate the size of people and she uses this to, either, shrink you down to size to be her baby or grows herself to 20 feet tall to baby you at the proportionate size she would need to be. Another choice is that your girlfriend convinces/blackmails you into wearing diapers diapers and mothering you to be her baby

4) Babysitter mess up
Being only 3 feet tall, you live with your mother and baby siblings. Your mother goes out of town for a week and hires a baby sitter to take care of 'her babies'. However, the babysitter thinks that you are one of them and starts to treat you as if you were their age.


5) Other
Additional ideas for extra story ideas

111.title: House

1111.content:
You decide the best course of action would be to examine and study the house before making any brash decisions. You climb back into the door of your wrecked ship and head into your equipment storage. The inside is what you were expecting, most of the equipment was in complete wreck after the crash, meaning what little equipment you had you’d have to use carefully as to not break or waste it, but now you were looking for one very specific piece of equipment, your Language Translator.

The boys back home managed to create a device that rests in your ear that documented and analyzed specific vocal patterns and word inflections of other races and translate them into the native tongue of the wearer, and not only that but it could also translate your words into the language of the species you were speaking to. This device has become pivotal for long range space exploration and diplomacy, and you knew without it you’d be in a lot more trouble than you originally thought.

After shuffling around the room for awhile you eventually find the device you were looking for at the bottom of a large box, the contents of which obviously jostled about. You pick up the small device and look it over. Unfortunately the device seems a little damaged, the small, but powerful, speaker seems to be bent and cracked. You know these things are water and fall proof, but you’re not entirely certain whether or not they’d be able to survive an asteroid field induced space crash. Unfortunately you have no choice but hope for the best as you go out on your scouting mission of the massive house.

So, with your Language Translator safely secured in your ear you leave behind your ship and start your trek towards the house, carefully hiding in or behind the bushes and trees that are scattered across the yard. You realize as you get closer you appear to be in what looks like the backyard of the house, as you see a back patio and a clothesline with a variety of clothes of different sizes hung up.

Suddenly as you get a grip on your surroundings you hear the sound of a door opening and peer from behind a tree towards the back door and see a woman step out carrying a large laundry basket. But this is no ordinary woman, this woman is massive, dwarfing you in size easily as you estimate you would probably only barely come up to her knee if not shorter. That wasn’t all however as her skin was an almost neon shade of pink, and she had long red hair that went down to her large butt. She wore what looked like a simple almost see through white robe that only went down to the middle of her upper thigh and did little to cover up her massive chest. You also hear her speaking to someone as she held a large phone like device next to her head.

Of course the words she spoke sounded like gibberish to you but not for long as the Language Translator did it’s job and slowly but surely began translating her words as she spoke.

“Yes Mom,” were the first things you heard this alien amazon speak, “me and Shirina are doing fine okay? Yes I’ll talk call you later I’m just getting some clothes off the line. Okay. Okay. Love you too. Bye.”

With that the alien sets her phone into the pocket of her robe and begins pulling clothes off the line before tossing them in the basket.

‘Now’s my chance,’ you think to yourself, ‘if my Language Translator can make me understand her then that means it’ll let her understand me.’

I step out from behind the tree, nervous to speak up to the titanic, beautiful woman in front of me, “Um excuse me mam, I mean you no harm I am a highly decorated space explorer and my ship crashed landed a bit of a ways away and was wondering if you could help me.”

Once you finish speaking the woman looks around before her eyes settle on you, a look of shock and confusion shown on her face as she stops what she was doing and as she bends down, getting a better look at you, “Oh my what’s a little thing like you doing here?”

As she bent down she allowed her robe to sag out, giving you a sightline down at her massive cleavage, causing you to stare a bit before responding, “What? Um uh like I just said I crashed landed nearby and need some assistance,” you say a little confused that she didn’t understand you the first time.

“Oh my and you look hurt,” she says with a bit of shock in her voice as she notices your cuts and bruises from the crash before walking towards you with her arms stretched out at you, “Come here little baby.”

“Baby what what are you talking about,” you say trying to back up but the giant woman easily catches you and lifts you into the air and into her arms where she examines you

“Oh my you poor baby,” she says getting a closer look at your wounds and cradling you against her large chest, the firmness and sheer size of each breasts made evident to you now.

“I am not a baby!” you say then it suddenly sinks in. Your translators English to New Language function must have been damaged in the crash too much rendering it completely worthless. Which means you understand her perfectly but everything you say comes out to her like baby babble!

“No let me go!” you say, flailing around to free yourself but the woman simply holds you tighter against her large bosom.

“Aw such a cranky little baby,” she says carrying you away, “I think I need to get you to _____ to get you taken care of.”
1111.title: Lost in Translation on an Alien Planet

114.content:
All of a sudden, a giant pare of hands picks you up. You are hoisted way up high, until you find yourself face to face with what LOOKS like a 5-year old girl, except for the fact that she's about twice as big as you!

"Oh, what a cute little dolly!" She exclaims, before giving you a big kiss on your face-her lips nearly covering your entire face.

Then, she suddenly pulls you into a hug, squeezing your body against hers, until you fear she'll crush your ribs.

"Oh, I'm gonna have so much fun with my new dolly!"

Finally, after several agonizing minutes, and just when you think you can handle no more, she breaks the hug, slinging you over her shoulder, and running away with you.

Several horrible, bumpy minutes later, you find yourself in her room.

She slings you down on the bed on your back, knocking most of the wind out of you.

"Now, let's get you dressed!" She says. Then, to your horror, she reaches for your pants, and begins undressing you!

You can't believe this! This little CHILD actually think's you're her Doll!
The pain in your bottom tells you it's not a good idea to fight her though, so you relent from any further struggling as she continues undressing you.

"Why are you wearing such funny clothes, dolly?" She asks.

You just close your eyes, groaning with frustration and humilation.

Once she has you completely naked, she starts rubbing baby lotion all over your body. You know it's weird, since she's only a child, but you can't help getting slightly aroused as her chubby, young, fingers work over your privates. A moment later, you find a pink t-shirt slipped over your head, which is two sizes too small. Next, she ties your hair into a single tuft on top of your head, using a bright pink ribbon.

She then picks you up, giving you another of those horrible hugs.

"Yay! Now you're all ready for bed!"

She carries you accross the room to a sort of dresser, on top of which, is a giant baby cradle. She sets you in the cradle, tucking you in, tight. She then kisses you on the forhead and sticks a giant baby bottle in your mouth.

"Now, you stay right in your little bed baby, and finish your baby bottle while I'm gone. Don't you try to get up before I get back, or Mommy will get very very angry!" She says, sternly.

You rolls your eyes, as you watch her leave.

Once the door is closed, you immediately begin fighting to free your arms from the covers. It is a tedious process, since the more you struggle, the more the stupid cradle rocks, and you don't want to rock it too much, lest you tip it over the edge of the dresser.

Finally, after several minutes, you succeed, sitting up in bed, and peering over the edge of the dresser. You estimate it to be about two or three times your own hight. In other worse, falling that far could cause some serious bone breaking.

You pause moment to concider your options. Maybe her parents are home. You could try calling out to see if anyone hears you, and comes looking for you. On the other hand, her species might be hostile as adults, it might be best to sneak out, and do some exploring first. You figure you could probably scale down this dresser, if you're careful.

On the other hand, your bottom is still rather sore from the small little smack you got earlier, you'd hate to think what this "LITTLE" girl might do if she REALLY gets angry with you.

Maybe you should just lie still like a "good baby" and bide your time for now, until Mommy gets back...

You bolt through the mall, daring not to look back, hearing the security guards yelling at you to stop. Your name is Derek Johnson, a very special criminal. However, it wasn't exactly your schemes or brains that made you special but rather, your size.

You stand at a very short 2 feet 6 inches, do to a disease you contracted as a child, stunting your growth when you were very young. It was because of your shortness you had endless ridicule from all, speaking down to you, making fun of you, those things turned you into the rogue, rugged small man you are today.

You pulled off the crimes you could, stealing petty cash from cash registers, taking things when no one was looking, until recently. You realized you could use your height as an advantage, you could fit and hide in tight spaces, making it fairly simple to sneak into places. Just a few days prior you had the brilliant idea of hiding inside a jewelry store inside of a mall, wait until the store closes, take everything you can, and sneak out when they security guard opens the door the next morning with your loot.

Unfortunately, it didn't exactly go the way you had planned.

You hide under a counter next to the door, waiting for the security guard to open it up as well as all the other shops, then you suddenly just see the officer walk right by your door. Confused, you look up at the window and see a sign you had not seen that reads, "Closed until 3 PM, Sorry for the Inconvenience."

"Oh no!" you think to yourself. "I wanted to get out of here before people started shopping, now its going to be so crowded."

Unable to do anything about your situation you wait around for awhile, waiting for the doors of the jewelers to open, you look out and watch as the mall becomes more and more packed and with each new person that enters, the more scared you are of being caught.

After what feels like an eternity you see a pair of high heels approach the door and stop in front of it as you hear the jingling of keys. You prepare yourself to make a bolt for it. The glass door opens fully and the woman takes a step in before you hear her gasp. You realize this is your best chance and jump from under the counter and out of the store.

"Oh oh my!" the woman squeals, "Hey come back here right now! Thief! Guards, guards go get that thief!"

You take a quick peak and see a pair of guards take a look at you and begin their pursuit. Luckily you've got quite a lead on them as you run through the legs of people walking throughout the mall. You know you cant keep this up forever so you have to make a decision on what to do fast. You look around and see two stores approaching, one is a large toy store that you could turn into pretty soon or you could turn into the mall's daycare center which could work considering you'd be hiding amongst people actually around your height. After a long day of working at the Make-A-Doll factory you were finally able to get out of this place and get to bed because you were exhausted. You went into the break room and clocked out and saw Jessica and Amanda getting their things and preparing to leave.

"Robert!" squealed Amanda running to you, "How was your day little guy," she says lifting you into the air.

"It was fine Amanda," you say sympathetically, "But can you please put me down, you know I don't like this."

"Aww," Amanda says pouting and holding you out in front of her, "I just can't help it, you always look so cute when i hold you"

"Put him down Amanda," scolds Jessica, "He's tired like the rest of us and wants to get home."

"Alright fine," Amanda concedes putting you back down, "But at least let us walk you out to your car little Robert."

"Ok thank you Amanda," you say, "Let's get goi-"

"Ah ah ah not so fast," you hear a voice cutting you off.

You turn and see Mandy in the door way, "We had a last minute complaint regarding one of the machines, I need you to check it out really fast."

"Can't it wait until tomorrow," you ask.

"No, now get to it," commands Mandy.

"Dont worry," Jessica says, "We'll wait for you Robert."

"Ok thank you guys, it'll probably only take me a minute or so," you say making your way following behind Mandy.

You walk in an awkward silence with her as you walk, and despite the fact she doesnt like her, you have to admit her ass is really nice as it waves in front of you as you walk behind it.

Soon enough your thoughts are interrupted as Mandy stops and opens the door to the factory area of the Make-A-Baby section.

"Alright what's the problem?" you ask.

"It would appear the main mechanical arm for transporting the dolls got jammed in the main doll holding area, just get it unjammed and you can be on your way, I'll monitor your progress through the display area by the guest control panel."

"Alright," you say and start making your way through the machine.

It doesn't take long before you find yourself next to a bin full of naked baby dolls, waiting to be dressed by their new owners. You see the arm got stuck trying to unjam a doll at the bottom of the bin somehow. The arm was continuing to try to pull the doll out so it was obviously still active.

"Hey Mandy," you scream through the window as she sits by the control panel, "Make sure this thing is shut off okay."

"I dont have the shut off key with me," cries out Mandy, "I'll grab it once your done, just get on with it so we can get out of here okay!"

You reluctantly comply, too scared to anger your co worker. You stand on the side of the doll bin and start pulling on the mechanical arm but it won't budge, you need to unclasp the arm from the doll itself, so you reluctantly slide into the bin and find the arm surrounding the waste of a baby doll and pry it open, forcing it to release.

Suddenly the arm pulls back and up and leaving you in the bin. You start to think your work is done and move to the side of the bin to escape when suddenly you feel the arm clasp around your stomach and bring you to the front of the display window.

You are shocked and suddenly hear a loud noise and the machine let off an error signal and suddenly more mechanical arms decended on you, ripping off your clothes leaving you bare.

You look out the window and see Mandy staring in shock and laugh at what she just saw.

"Stop laughing and get me the hell out of this thing Mandy!" you scream.

"Haha this is priceless," Mandy laughs, "You know what," she says with a mischievous smile, "I've been meaning to get to making one of these dolls on my own, I just havent had the time being so busy."

She starts touching the controls and the machine begins to come to life again. "Mandy," the concern vivid in your voice, "What are you doing?"

"Hush baby doll," she smiles, "it's time for a makeover!"

Your day started off like any other, wake up, get dressed, head to work, taking the bus of course as driving a car has shown far to difficult for someone your height, and start your day.

You walk into work early as you always do to avoid the curious eye of customers and bystanders seeing such a small man work in a doll store, for some the irony results in an audible giggle but you avoid that all together by coming in the back door.

You pound on the back door as hard as your little hand can and moments later are greeted by your co-worker Jessica, dressed in a modest pair of jeans and tank top. The final touch is her hair long red hair pulled back into a single pony tail.

“Well good morning Robert,” she says smiling down at you as she does every day.

“Morning Jess,” you say walking inside, “what’s on the docket today?”

“Well,” Jessica says closing the door behind you, “we’ve got a few things left to do with that new packing machine for those new dolls that just arrived that needs to be finished by the end of the day, but between the two of us, and considering it’s probably gonna be a slow day, you and I can knock that out in a couple hours. That is unless our ‘best friend’ Mandy comes around and had an ‘important job’ for one of us.”

You laugh at her mockery of Mandy. Ever since you and Jess had become closer friends Mandy has seemed to make it her mission to get in the way of you two, whether that being during their break or during their work. You both just chocked it up to her seemingly unexplainable hatred of you, but something deep down makes you think she has some ulterior motive for her actions.

“Well,” you say, clapping your hands together, “let’s get to work then shall we?”

Jessica laughs and walks past you towards the unfinished machine. It doesn’t take very long but by the end of it you’re wiped. Between having to crawl in and out of the service ducts to attach each component hook and having to oil up the gears you are ready for a break.

“Nice job Lil Rob,” Jessica says, stepping down from the control panel, “I’ve wired up the controls so once I connect the power coupling to the doll bin we’ll be set to go, just give me one sec.”

You watch her step past you to climb the attached ladder to the top of the machine when suddenly you hear an all too familiar voice.

“Well well well,” you hear Mandy say from behind you. You turn and see her dressed in her pink skirt and low cut blouse, her modified version of the sales uniform. “Looks like you two have been hard at work. These dolls were scheduled to be on the shelves tomorrow but considering it’s set to go when the first batch get’s boxed I want them out on the sales floor.”

“Whatever you say Mandy,” Jessica says, “I just need to plug in a coupling to the doll storage then it’ll be set.”

“Perfect,” Mandy says, “Leave that to Robert here. I could use your help moving around the dolls to make room for these new ones.”

Jessica steps down from the ladder and looks down at you, “You know what you’re doing with that coupling?”

“Yeah,” you say up to Jessica, “I’ll take care of this, you go and I’ll meet you when you’re done on the sales floor.”

Jessica nods her hand and smiles and walks off with Mandy, you watch the two girls walk out the door and turn your attention to the ladder. Climbing the ladder takes a lot of time and a lot of balance at your size, you fear going too fast would cause you to slip and go plummeting to the ground. Finally you make it to the top and see the coupling Jessica was talking about. You connect the power and the entire machine begins buzzing to life.

After a few moments of warm up you see the arms of the machine begin to descend on the bin of dolls, plucking one at a time and bringing it towards the converter belt where each doll will be diapered, dressed, and boxed up for purchase.

You start to make your way to the ladder but the smooth metal surface of the machine, as well as the vibration of energy coming from it causes you to lose your footing and plummet down into the new doll storage bin.

The fall didn’t hurt so much thanks to the fact that these dolls are brand new, state of the art dolls, with a soft, skin like texture as opposed to their much cheaper plastic counter parts. You struggle to get your footing as you look over and see an internal ladder on the far side of the bin. You do your best to rush to the bars of the ladder, staggering on the doll surface and just as your hand is but a few inches from the ladder you feel a metal claw grip you around your waist.

“Noooo!” you scream as the machine plucks you up from the bin and deposits you on a conveyer belt. The machine is quick as lightning, effortlessly removing your clothes, diapering you, and pulling a big pink dress over your head.

The machine stands you up and pulls your short hair back into two small pig tails. The final touch is a large pink pacifier being shoved into your mouth and wrapped around your head. You then feel the arms pin you to what feels like cardboard and twist ties wrap around your arms and legs, holding you in place. Finally you are deposited into a large box with a clear plastic front putting your trapped, dollified body on display for anyone to see.

You feel the arms move your box and place it on a pallet next to about a couple dozen real dolls, as well as placing a few behind you before the entire pallet is pushed away from the machine so it can start fresh.

You try to struggle from your bonds but are unable to get them to budge even a bit, your only hope is for Jessica to come back and see you’re gone and maybe put two and two together.

As if on cue you see Jessica burst through the door. At the sight of her you double your efforts to free yourself or just try to get her attention. Unfortunately for you Jessica seems to be too preoccupied to pay much attention to the new dolls, instead you see her hope inside forklift and begin driving it to the pallet you’re currently on top of!

The forklift connects with the pallet and the whole thing is lifted a few inches off the ground, driven through a wide door into the salesroom, and deposited in the center, a place of honor for new dolls.

You can only stare in terror at the room around you as a few young girls walk up and down the aisles, scanning the new dolls. You try to remain as still as possible as the girls prod and grab at the shiny new toys they could buy!

“Thank God it’s a slow day,” you think to yourself, closing your eyes in an attempt to calm yourself, “after awhile the girls are gonna realize I’m gone and have to see me!”

Unfortunately for you, just as you finish thinking those words of hope you feel the box being lifted into the air. You open your eyes in shock and see the face of a…
1523.title: On a slow work day

15231.content:
Your eyes shoot open as your box is lifted off the shelf and brought to the face of a young, blonde haired girl. The girl smiles down at you, like any child would a brand new toy.

Your eyes dart to her right and see an incredible attractive blonde woman lean over the girls shoulder to inspect you, offering you a spectacular view of her enormous cleavage.

“This one looks cute Anna,” she says to the girl.

“She’s perfect!”The girl squeals and pulls the box in, denting the cardboard, causing it to concave slightly around you. “Can I get it Mommy! Please please pleaseeeeee!”

“Alright sweetheart,” the woman laughs, “toss it in the cart.”

“Yay!” The girl says throwing you inside the top of the cart.

You land face up, only able to see the mother pushing the cart and the ceiling above you. You finally have an opportunity to get a good view of the mother and see she seems to be about mid 30s with long, blonde hair. She wears minimal makeup, aside from a bright red lipstick. Most notable to you however is her massive chest. At your size and angle her breasts seem to defy gravity as they rest seemingly weightless in the air, bouncing with each step. The very sight alone of them contained behind her white blouse is enough to excite you.

Your thoughts are interrupted as you see other items being thrown in the cart, including more dresses, feeding accessories, holding harnesses, and even another doll.

“This Mom must spoil this girl rotten,” you think to yourself.

You realize in your current situation you need to try to get the mother to notice you before her daughter can get her hands on you. You shiver at the thought of being used as this brats doll.

You redouble your efforts to escape the box, flailing as much as your restrictive bonds would allow you. You look up and see two hands descend down towards you, you rejoice for a moment thinking you’ve got her attention but instead your box is scanned and deposited into a large plastic bag, followed by the other doll and assorted accessories thrown into the cart.

You’ve just been bought!
15231.title: A young girl with her mother beside her

15232.content:
You can do nothing but stare out past your plastic barrier as a beautiful young redheaded teenager lifts your box into the air and smiles down at you.

“Aw it’s so cute!” she says, her eye’s scanning every inch of you, “the clothes are a little low quality but still the level of design they’ve put into this new line of dolls is incredible!”

“Jeez Kaitlyn,” a dark haired girl in black lipstick says stepping next to her friend to get a better look at you, “i still can’t get over how obsessed with dolls you are.”

“Yeah,” a new girl with blonde hair says stepping forward as well, “it’s like all you ever talk about.”

“Oh come on, guys” Kaitlyn, the girl holding you, says defensively, “They’re just so cute, and besides everybody needs a hobby.”

“Whatever,” the dark haired girl scoffs, “Now just buy your toy so we can get going!”

With that Kaitlyn lets you box fall to her side as she holds it with her right hand as she waits in line to buy you. Soon enough you are lifted back up and laid down on the checkout counter where you see your coworker Mandy smiling at customers.

“With this be all for today?” Mandy asks.

“Um yes,” Kaitlyn replies.

“Do you have a rewards card with us?”

“Um, yes,” Kaitlyn awkwardly replies, handing over a small pink card to Mandy.

Mandy swipes the card and her eyes go wide as she reads the screen.

“Oh my,” Mandy says with a giggle, “one of our regulars I see.”

Kaitlyn just laughs slightly, obviously a little embarrassed.

“Well,” Mandy says picking up your box and handing it to Kaitlyn, “we appreciate loyal customers so this one is on the house.”

“Really?” Kaitlyn asks, excitement evident in her voice.

“Of course,” Mandy smiles back, “and if you’re ever looking for a job we’d be happy to have such a dedicated doll enthusiast on our team!”

“Oh t-thank you,” Kaitlyn says, unable to hide her smile, “I’ll definitely consider it!”

“Good to hear, now you have a good day now and enjoy your new doll.”

You can’t believe you just had to sit through watching you coworker off this young girl a job and then give you away to her for free! You try to struggle yet again but it’s no use, for the time being, you’re this girl’s new doll!

“Alright girls,” Kaitlyn says to her friends, “I think it’s time…”
15232.title: A teenage girl and a group of her friends

choices: In one of the doll cribs!
in the arms of one my Life Size Barbies!
152321.content:
“Alright I’ll see you girls later,” Katilyn says walking off with you in tow.

Kaitlyn makes her way through and out of the mall before seating herself in the drivers seat of a red sedan. She gently places your box on the floor of the passenger side front seat and begins driving off.

After about a 20 minute drive you feel the familiar bump of a curb and hear Kaitlyn turn off the car and lift your box up and out of the car with her. You have a moment to see the nice suburban house Kaitlyn lives before she begins walking towards the front door where she opens it with ease. Kaitlyn then hastily runs up a set of stairs and through a hall before opening up a bedroom door, no doubt her own room, and stepping inside.

“Welcome to your new home,” Kaitlyn says quietly down to you.

You look around the room and see a shocking sight. When you heard this girl liked dolls you didn’t realize just how much. The entire room decorated like that of a Barbie Dreamhouse. You see dozens of dolls stacked precisely on her bed, others locked behind glass display cases, an entire wall dedicated to baby doll cribs, even in the corner you see life size replicas of popular Barbie dolls all arranged in precise poses! You realize that whatever this doll fanatic has planned for you is WAY over your head! It’ll will probably do you good to not let this girl know her new doll is actually a human being, there’s no telling what sick ideas she would get!

Kaitlyn places your box on her bed and begins delicately opening the box to pull you out. When you are finally out she lays you down on her lap as she stares down at you as you attempt to be as doll like as possible.

“So much detail,” Kaitlyn says delicately caressing your cheek, “I think you're going to be my new favorite! Now first things first, I think the best place to keep you would be…”

You look out of the box and see three rows of desks and chairs facing towards the assortments of dolls and yourself. You suddenly see the teacher from before cross in front of you, eyeing the arrangement of doll boxes.

“Perfect,” She says with a smile, clearly satisfied with the display of dolls in front of her, “time to introduce you all to your new mommies!”

‘What the hell does she mean by that?’ You think to yourself.

You want to squirm to try and get her attention but your bonds are just too tight as they hold you tightly in place, permitting no movement.

The teacher stands and turns her back to the dolls and walks towards a large wooden door in the far right corner of the room. She pulls the door open and you can only stare in shock as a wave of girls flood into the room.

“Alright girls take your seats,” You hear the teacher yell over the chorus of giggles and chatter from the girls.

You see what looks like at least 20 teenage girls sitting down at the desks, talking amongst themselves, the most observant of which are pointing towards and talking about the large display of baby dolls at the front of the room.

Once all the girls are sat down the teacher approaches the front of the room and stands besides you and the dolls.

“Alright girls settle down,” she says followed by the silence of the girls’ compliance, “my name is Ms. Carol and welcome to Beginner’s Home Economics. We’ll be going over a variety of subjects this semester, some being, cooking, sex Ed, and, as you can see at the front of the room, child care.”

With that Ms. Carol gestures towards you and the dolls, causing the girls seated to giggle in response.

“Most students find this project to be the most fun so I figured we’d get right into it. What you will need to do is form into groups of two. Once you’ve chosen a partner you will pick a doll up from the front of the room as well as supply bag I’ve prepared for your groups to use. Now these dolls are state of the art so they’ll cry, use their diapers, and need to be fed. Not only that but they’ll record how well their “mommies” take care of them and upon the semester’s end I’ll check your score and however your baby thinks you did will be your final grade so you’d better take care of it! Now, why don’t you all take a few minutes and sort out your groups and pick up your doll!”

With that you watch as the girls all talk amongst themselves and sort into groups before approaching the dolls in the front. The girls pick up box after box around you as you can only remain motionless knowing soon two of these girls will claim you as their doll.

Soon enough you feel your box being lifted into the air and you see the faces of...

153.content:
Your name is Jack Welster, a 16 year old who has had an unfortunate string of bad luck. With your father dead and your mother being unable to take care of your needs, you were given to foster care with no hope of ever being adopted into a home. Add to the fact that you were shorter than an average male being exactly 5 feet, you seemed to be always invisible to everyone around you.

It appeared that hope did exist though; however, it was both disbelieving and equally incredible. A 34 year old woman with blond hair, standing at least a foot taller than you with the most enormous jugs you saw appeared before you and specifically caught eye of you. Despite all the better choices, this woman decided to take you in. Her name was Rachel Garner  .

She was apparently a big CEO of a huge corporation which involve designing and building products that are supposed to make child-care easier. Everything from tracker to baby holders. Although you didn't think much of the corporation, you had no idea how a CEO of a child-care engineering company would effect your daily lifestyle.

As you sat awkwardly in the front seat as your new guardian drove, smiling at you warmly from time to time as you headed to your new home. Despite taking you in, she had so far not said a single word to you but reassuring smiles. Knowing that you may live with his woman for the rest of your life until you move onto college, you decided to speak up.

"Um...so Rachel, are you a busy woman?" you asked, deciding to start off with work.

Rachel held her gaze to the road, but otherwise, she answered him with an amused smile.

"I suppose you can say that although I've delegated a lot of the work to my associates. By the way, please call me mommy. I didn't adopt you just to become your legal guardian, Jack. I also wanted a son since I have not been able to truly have one of my own," she explained.

You were a little surprised. You felt uncomfortable calling her such an endearing term when you barely knew her. Of course, you didn't want to upset her so you forced yourself.

"Then m-mommy, why didn't you just adopt a baby instead?" you asked, turning slightly red.

Rachel could hear how uncomfortable you were and patted your lap reassuringly with one arm as she drove with the other.

"Don't worry, I promise it will come naturally. As for why I adopted you, I didn't want to worry about taking care and raising a baby. At the same time, you're perfect enough to allow me to test and take care of you."

You furrowed your eyebrows in confusion. "Test and take care?"

Rachel didn't answer as she slowed the car. Looking outside, you saw that you had arrived at your new home. It was a complete shocker as you she basically had a mansion with a huge outside gardener. It was filled with all sorts of caretakers such as gardeners and butlers.

"Wow..." you gasped. Perhaps all that bad luck you had was bound to flip someday.

"Why don't we go inside so that we can talk some more," Rachel suggested.

Nodding a little dumbfounded, a butler arrived to open your door, allowing you to step out. Another butler opened your new mother's door and was provided the keys to the car to park in the right place.

Following Rachel inside her gorgeous home. She took you hand and led you like a little child towards a nearby room. Inside, you saw...

1531.content:
You opened in mouth, amazed at the large and spacious room. It appeared to be for some older adult and husband as it held a queen sized bed with curtains, various armoires and drawers, and a large makeup stall with a mirror.

"Uhm...is this your room?" you asked, wondering why she would bring you of all places to such a mature room.

"Yes, but it is also where you will be sleeping. Every night, you will be sleeping with me," she stated as a matter of fact.

Your eyes would have bulged out if it could. You began to stutter and shake your head.

"A-ah...that won't be necessary. I can sleep on my-"

You paused as you heard Rachel sigh. "Perhaps, I need to be a little honest wih you, Jack. Since you are my son, I want to close the gap between us as soon as possible. That means you will be spending every day with me and you will be under my care, understand?"

No, you didn't understand. You were a 16 year old teenager, not some child neding to be taken care of.

"...wh-what about your husband?" you asked, hoping that your presence would cause a problem with her husband.

"I divorced and kicked him out a week ago for not willing to work," she answered bluntly.

You widened your mouth in disbelief and then began to see what kind of personality she possessed. She was clearly a person who did not appreciate laziness and disobedience. Quickly, you wondered if you should be arguing so early after she had just adopted you.

She was being a little unreasonable with your accomodations after all, right?

"Ok," she says, "I think it's time we got to bed, anyway. Let me get you ready for bed."

You look at her, perplexed. "Umm...what do you..."

"Sweety, you have just proven that you are too young and innocent to take care of yourself, and clearly you cannot be trusted at night, so I am afraid we will have to get you into some protection." To your shock, she pulls out a diaper. "Alright, Sweetie, drop your drawers, and lie down for Mommy"

She looks down at your, sympathetically."Awwe, Sweety, don't be so upset. Mommy love you..." Then, to your shock, she lies right on top of you, her huge breasts pressing right into your face, practically smothering you. Suddenly, you forget all about your awful situation, and even the burning in your buns. After a brief moment, she sits back up, smiling down at you. You turn your face away, as your bad mood returns. "First, let's see what we can do about this red bottom." Then, you suddenly feel her hands, covered in cool, soothing, lotion, rubbing all over your bare bottom. It feels solo releiving, and you hear yourself sighing despite yourself. "See, isn't that better?"

Sense she can't see you, you allow yourself a grin, and feel yourself growing hard against the bed. You even find a strange enjoyment as she slips a finger up inside you. By the time she turns you back over, you have a strong erection.

"Oh my," she exclaims, "we'll have to do something about this!"

To your horror, she grabs your shaft with her lotion-covered hands, and begins pumping you off. This is so embarrassing-you try as hard as you can to fight it, but soon, you find yourself exploding into a tissue for your very first hand job.

You are Alex Stevens, a 22 year old man who recently moved out to California in hopes of finding work. Luckily for you while you were searching through endless lists of apartments and houses that were too far out of your price range you found the perfect place.

"WANTED: Space available. Fully furnished room. Amenities paid for. Two female roommates. Price: QUALITY TIME."

You immediately emailed them explaining your interest, you sent in references and financial records, and weirdly enough they asked for a picture but you decided not to look a gift horse in the mouth and send it in and within a week you had packed your bags and were currently in a taxi making your way to your new home.

The taxi pulls up to a decent sized house and you got your bags out and walked up to the front door before ringing the door bell. You hear a crash in the house, no doubt someone was shocked by the doorbell.

"Coming!" you hear a feminine voice through the door, "We'll be right there!"

You wait a moment before the door swings open and you're met with the beautiful faces of your two new roommates, Ashley and Mandy. Ashley has long blonde hair that she pulls back to show her face and Mandy's hair is jet black and glares at you with a look of almost longing. Both girls are the pinnacle of female beauty with large firm breasts and asses you could bounce a coin off of. You can't help but stare at the low cut tops both girls wear but you snap out of it and smile at the girls.

"Hi," you say, "I'm Alex, I'm here for the open room."

"God they are gorgeous," you say to yourself.

You turn around and see her and Mandy walking back into the room with some drinks in hand. "Oh I'm sorry," you say embarrassed they hear you gawking over them, "I was just uh-"

"It's okay sweetheart," Mandy says, "It's cute to hear you gawk over us now come over here and have something to drink you must be thirsty after your long ride," she says patting a spot on the couch between the two women.

You are Greg Stevens, a 22 year old man fresh out of college for summer vacation. You've decided not to head home for the summer but rather have an adventure on your own. You gassed up your old truck, stuffed some essentials in a duffel bag and took off ready to drive across the country in a summer long road trip, visiting all the exciting sights. You had been driving for the past few days, stopping in cheap motels to rest, seeing a few of the local sights and was all in all having an amazing time.

Currently you are driving your truck down a random rural road about an hour from civilization. Your eyes starting to feel incredibly heavy.

"I knew I should have just stayed the night back there in that little town," you thought to yourself.

Unfortunately you didn't heed your own warnings and continued through the night. Eventually as you drove you noticed a pair of flashing yellow lights in the distance, more than likely someone's hazards.

As you approached the lights you noticed a woman frantically waving her arms in the air, signaling to please pull over. Always one to assist someone in their time of crisis you passed her car slightly before pulling into the dirt next to the road. Still a little uneasy you leave the keys in the ignition and open your door to hop out.

"Excuse me," you say, "What seems to be the issue mam?"

"Oh thank goodness you stopped," the woman says, barely visible as her headlights are right in your face, "I was driving home when I got a low pressure warning and saw that my tire popped, you're the first car to even pass by."

"Why didn't you try calling someone?" you ask.

"The woman holds up her phone defeated, "I tried, no cell service out here. If you don't mind I got a spare tire in the back, I'd have done it myself I just never knew how."

You laugh a little at the woman's predicament, "Alright yeah I'll help you out."

"Thank you so much! I'm Erika by the way."

You follow Erika to the back of the car, finally able to get a good look at her. She's a very attractive woman, probably in her early to mid thirties with blonde hair and striking blue eyes. Her body is incredible as well. You also notice in the car a baby seat, realizing she might have a kid to get home to. You don't think about it too much, just wanting to get the job done.

info.brief_description: You are treated as if you were a baby
info.description:
Another collaboration with another friend of mine about diapers.

This story focuses on being forced into diapers or being treated like a baby. It may be against your will or you could like it or it could grow on you.

Rules:
1) Sex should be very rare. All girls in this want you to be their baby or to be a baby for someone else.
2) Make additions that are written well and at least a paragraph long. We don't need endlessly repeating 'other' chapters
3) No sudden changes to the established storyline
4) No shrinking beyond 1 foot tall
5) If the chapters involve giantesses, remember that you are baby-sized compared to them, so their size would be about 15 to 22 feet tall
6) No death
7) There is onle one man: you. Only women except for the main character
